meanings.definition: A type of plant with tubular flowers that resemble a beard or tongue.
meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with beautiful beardtongues swaying in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: I planted some beardtongues in my backyard garden to attract butterflies.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide his acorns in the beardtongues, thinking they were safe.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a field of colorful beardtongues blooming in the spring.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the beardtongues lingered in the air long after the sun had set.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'beardtongue', referring to multiple plants of this type.
meanings.sent1: In the botanical garden, various beardtongues of different colors created a stunning display.
meanings.sent2: The hikers marveled at the vast field of beardtongues stretching out before them.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended the beardtongues were a secret hideout from imaginary pirates.
meanings.sent4: The market was bustling with vendors selling fresh produce alongside bundles of beardtongues.
meanings.sent5: As the sun rose, the valley was blanketed in a sea of vibrant beardtongues.
